meanings.definition: Of or relating to the nose and mouth.
meanings.sent1: The orinasal congestion made it hard to breathe through my nose.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined my orinasal passages to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The orinasal spray tasted like minty toothpaste!
meanings.sent4: Her orinasal voice carried a hint of a cold, even in the summer.
meanings.sent5: The orinasal sensation of smelling and tasting at the same time was strange.

meanings.definition: A speech sound produced with both the nose and mouth.
meanings.sent1: The singer's orinasal tone added a unique quality to the song.
meanings.sent2: Linguists study the orinasal sounds in different languages.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke about an orinasal accent had the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed in an orinasal rhythm, captivating the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The orinasal pronunciation of certain words can be challenging for learners.
